inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ultrasound revealed several gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones

exclusion.criterion: Serum ALT > 3 times ULN at baseline.
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Laboratory analysis is remarkable for elevated ESR and leukocytosis with a left shift.

exclusion.criterion: History of excess alcohol ingestion, averaging more than 30 gm/day (3 drinks per day) in the previous 10 years, or history of alcohol intake averaging greater than 10 gm/day (1 drink per day: 7 drinks per week) in the previous one year.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of liver cirrhosis on labs or imaging.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of hypercholesterolemia and 2 NVDs, but no other significant medical conditions. She is mildly febrile with a BP of 150/85 and HR of 115.
